data.title: Generals Who Served in the French Army during the Period 1789
data.text:
Generals Who Served in the French Army during the Period 1789 - 1814: Mocquery to Moynat d'Auxon

By: Tony Broughton

The ranks Marechal de Camp and Lieutenant-General were used prior to the Revolution and ceased being used by the Decree of 21 February 1793 being replaced by the ranks of General de Brigade and General de� Division.

Mocquery (Georges Alexis)

Born: 26 December 1771

General de Brigade: 6 August 1811

Officer of the Legion d’Honneur: 4 September 1808

Died: 19 March 1847

Molitor (Gabriel Jean Joseph)

Born: 7 March 1770

Adjudant General Chef de Brigade: 13 June 1795

General de Brigade: 3 July 1799

General de Division: 26 October 1800

Grand Officer of the Legion d’Honneur: 28 July 1806

Died: 28 July 1849

Monard (Jean Nicolas)

Moncey (Bon Adrien Jannot)

Born: 31 July 1754

General de Brigade: 18 February 1794

General de Division: 9 June 1794

Grand Eagle of the Legion d’Honneur: 2 February 1805

Duke of the Empire: 25 July 1808

Marechal of the Empire: 19 May 1804

Died: 20 April 1842

Monet (Georges)

Born: 5 December 1751

Chef de Brigade: 3 May 1794 (177e demi-brigade de bataille)

General de Brigade: 13 June 1795

Died: 14 June 1802

Money (John)

Born: 1752

Marechal de Camp: 19 July 1792 (In the service of France)

Colonel: 21 August 1795

Major General: 18 June 1798

Lieutenant General: 4 June 1814

Died: 26 March 1817

Mongenet (Francois Bernard)

Born: 17 December 1765

Colonel: 30 March 1808

Colonel: 28 March 1811 (4e Regiment d’Artillerie a Pied)

General de Brigade: 4 June 1813

Commander of the Legion d’Honneur: 19 November 1813

Died: 6 January 1823

Monleau (Andre)

Born: 1 December 1759

Chef de Brigade: October 1793

General de Brigade: 20 November 1793

Officer of the Legion d’Honneur: 14 June 1804

Died: 10 February 1810

Monnet de Lorbeau (Louis Claude)

Monnier (Jean Charles)

Born: 22 March 1758

General de Brigade: 23 April 1796

General de Division: 6 March 1800

Died: 30 January 1816

Monnyer de Prilly (Marie Pierre Hypolithe de)

Born: 13 February 1737

Colonel: 25 July 1791

Marechal de Camp: 12 July 1792

Died: 27 April 1796

Monroux (Joseph)

Born: 12 February 1767

Chef de Brigade: 19 June 1797 (28e demi-brigade d’infanterie legere)

General de Brigade: 31 May 1800

Died: 6 May 1801

Montaigu (Anne Charles Basset)

Born: 10 June 1751

General de Brigade: 1 November 1793

General de Division: 21 May 1794

Died: 8 May 1821

Montalembert (Marc Rene)

Born: 16 July 1714

Marechal de Camp: 30 February 1761

General de Division: 23 February 1793

Died: 28 March 1800

Montbrun (Louis Pierre)

Montbrun (Alexandre)

Montchoisy (Louis Antoine Choin de)

Montelegier (Gabriel Gaspard Achille Adolphe Bernon )

Monter (Jean Etienne Francois)

Montesquiou - Fezensac (Anne Pierre)

Born: 17 October 1739

Colonel: 30 November 1761 (Regiment Royal des Vaisseaux)

Marechal de Camp: 1 March 1780

Died: 30 December 1798

Montesquiou - Fezensac (Philippe Andre Francois de Marsan)

Born: 30 November 1753

Marechal de Camp: 6 October 1791

Died: 7 February 1833

Montfalcon (Jean)

Born: 5 February 1767

Chef de Brigade : 10 April 1803

General de Brigade: 1 January 1814

Officer of the Legion d’Honneur: 9 August 1812

Chevalier of the Empire: 29 January 1811

Died: 12 May 1845

Montfort (Jacques de)

Montgaillard (Charles Bernard Joseph Persin de la Valette)

Born: 27 May 1747

Marechal de Camp: 6 February 1792

Died: 26 February 1798

Montmarie (Louis Francois Elie Pelletier)

Born: 12 March 1771

Colonel: 18 March 1807

General de Brigade: 5 May 1809

Commander of the Legion d’Honneur: 11 March 1812

Baron of the Empire: 26 April 1810

Died: 17 February 1854

Montmarie (Aime Sulpice Victor Pelletier)

Montredon (Joseph Louis Francois Hyacinthe)

Born: 1743

Marechal de Camp: 15 March 1792

Died: 2 September 1801

Montrichard (Joseph Helie Desire Perruquet)

Born: 24 January 1760

Adjudant General Chef de Brigade: 13 June 1795

General de Brigade: 2 August 1796

General de Division: 5 February 1799

Commander of the Legion d’Honneur: 14 June 1804

Died: 5 April 1828

Morand (Joseph)

Born: 18 July 1757

General de Brigade: 14 November 1794

General de Division: 27 April 1800

Commander of the Legion d’Honneur: 14 June 1804

Baron of the Empire: 15 August 1810

Died: 5 April 1813 (Died of wounds)

Morand (Charles Antoine Louis Alexis)

Morand du Puch de Grangeneuve ( Pierre)

Born: 14 February 1739

Colonel: 3 June 1793 (7e Regiment d’Artillerie a Pied)

General de Brigade: 8 March 1793

General de Division: 15 May 1793

Died: 28 May 1819

Morangies (Jean Baptiste Molette)

Moreau (Jean Claude)

Moreau (Jean Victor)

Born: 14 February 1763

General de Brigade: 20 December 1793

General de Division: 14 April 1794

Died: 1 September 1813 (Died of wounds received at the battle of Dresden)

Moreaux (Jean Rene)

Born: 14 March 1758

General de Brigade: 15 May 1793

General de Division: 30 July 1793

Died: 10 February 1795

Moret (Denis Jacques)

Born: 14 March 1747

Chef de Brigade: 3 May 1793 (110e demi-brigade de bataille)

General de Brigade: 13 June 1795

Died: 10 February 1795

Moreton Chabrillant (Jacques Henri Sebastien Cesar)

Born: 5 December 1752

Marechal de Camp: 13 December 1791

Died: 23 April 1793

Morgan (Jacques Polycarpe)

Born: 26 January 1759

Chef de Brigade: 20 March 1793 (10e Regiment de Hussards)

General de Brigade: 10 March 1795

Commander of the Legion d’Honneur: 14 June 1804

Died: 27 June 1843

Morin (Pierre Nicolas) – 2e Regiment de Carabiniers

Morin (Jean Baptiste Louis)

Morio de L'isle (Annet) – 16e Regiment d'Infanterie Legere

Born: 5 May 1766

General de Brigade: 20 September 1793

General de Division: 3 December 1793

Died: 22 March 1809

Moroni (Ange Pierre)

Born: 29 March 1762

Colonel: 26 June 1808 (Regiment Royale Dalmate)

Colonel: 29 March 1810 (Regiment des Consrits de la Garde Royale Italienne)

Colonel: 28 August 1810 (Regiment des Vilites Royaux de la Garde)

General de Brigade: 11 January 1813 (Italien)

Member of the Legion d’Honneur: 30 March 1809

Baron of the Empire: 24 October 1813

Died: 27 October 1835

Mortier (Adolphe Edouard Casimir Joseph)

Born: 13 February 1768

Chef de Brigade: 16 January 1797 (23e Regiment de Cavalerie)

General de Brigade: 23 February 1799

General de Division: 25 September 1799

Marechal d’Empire: 19 May 1804

Grand Eagle of the Legion d’Honneur: 2February 1805

Duc de Trevise: 2 July 1808

Died: 28 July 1835 (Assasinated)

Mossel (Jean Louis Olivier)

Motte (Robert)

Born: 3 December 1754

General de Brigade: 22 April 1794

Commander of the Legion d’Honneur: 14 June 1804

Baron of the Empire: 20 February 1812

Died: 30 May 1829

Born: 14 March 1752

General de Brigade: 5 August 1793

General de Division: 28 November 1793

Officer of the Legion d’Honneur: 10 May 1807

Died: 12 March 1810

Moulin (Jean Baptiste)

Mourier (Pierre)
